title: "Control Your Perceptions and Awaken Your Serpent Power: Breathing and Symbolic Water Exercise"
first_phrase: This text explores an exercise that can help an individual achieve control over their perceptions. The exercise involves putting a hand in a basin of cold water and the other hand in a basin of hot water before trying to reverse the perceptions without using imagination. The exercise also has a strong symbolic value, representing the non-conditioning and the upper dimension of the individual's being. In the last 200 tokens, the text delves deeper into the process of awakening the serpent power through detachment from primary senses and isolation from the physical world. By doing this, an individual can awaken their magnetism through the projection of energy with a specific sound or mantra.
